issues.title: Push new column to the left instead of right
issues.body: Especially when using single page mode on small screen, user need to scroll down to the bottom to view the new column.

issues.title: Mention sometimes duplicate itself
issues.body:
Happened when receiving new mention, no info in the console. Probably has sth to do with the address, happened when using sub-addresses like [the magin link](/sakana.bit/?/tl/:title=Comments%20by%20following%20users/:description=It%20was%20good%20magic./:types=$comment/following:user=self:degree=1) in your post and [the profile link](/sakana.bit/?Profile/12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv/18fLf6bqfzvGLvMA2DrEmDxiqvnAWyN6dv/ixhb5a7vwvdgimjx@zeroid.bit), haven't observed this issue when using the default address http://127.0.0.1:43110/sakana.bit/.
--- ---
It's not only Mentions column, other columns that receive new content are also affected.

issues.title: Remove link from the mention
issues.body:
When mention others, on Sakana a link to the user's profile is added. That's quite a nice feature but it has some disadvantages:
The link text is quite long and can eat up the limited storage if a user has too many activities. The link text is in front of the post, and on ZeroHello newsfeed the actual post is hidden by it.

Instead I think users can use `search user` feature to search others. Or Sakana may auto-generate the link for text that has the pattern `@user`. Like what sakana has done for `|><||>`

issues.title: Old Image preview cache won't get cleaned after re-uploading a new one
issues.body:
Reproduce:
1. create a post with an image
2. re-edit the image and upload a new image with different ratio (won't be covered by the old one).

Then the old image preview is on the top of the new one (blurred), refreshing the screen doesn't work, need to clean cache.
